summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an additional reimbursable appropriation from the Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds, 1960 Fund for completion of plans, specifications and cost estimates for the rehabilitation of the Fourth Avenue South Viaduct authorized by Ordinance No. 105557, and authorizing the Mayor to execute a supplemental agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Highways, providing for increased financial aid under the Federal Aid "M" Program, Federal Aid Highway Act of 1970.
